Title: Requires hospitals to have a registered professional nurse as a sitting and voting member of the governing entity responsible for developing a hospital's strategic plan, structure, systems, policies and programs
Summary: Requires hospitals to have a registered professional nurse as a sitting and voting member of the governing entity responsible for developing a hospital's strategic plan, structure, systems, policies and programs.
LawCode: Amd ยง2801-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring hospitals to have a registered professional nurse as a sitting and voting member of the governing entity responsible for developing the hospital's strategic plan, structure, systems, policies and programs
